bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a diarrhea where a depletion of stomach and intestines has eliminated the ability of these organs to digest solid food with the result that they are discharged together with water/liquid. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 40: 腸虛則泄，故變為利也，此 下利是水穀利也 , “Intestinal depletion leads to outflow. Hence this changes to free-flux [illness]. This type of discharge with free-flux is water and grain freeflux [illness] ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 also has shui gu xia li 水谷下利 , “Water and grain discharge with free-flux”.
